text:
Super insightful <@U7SL518D6> - How might we (quickly/easily) document this for future developers to be aware of??
Maybe a short/sweet blog post for CMS Dev blog?

I can help organize the blog, I just need some help with the content.
We can link to Crankshaft to help promote it too
Yes I could help with the blog post, and either one, which ever you guys feel is more relevant for it to be in.
